Articles.Content:
I've begun designing the Ambitious in VAB. Current plan is to design the entire craft, and then build it in space at an orbital shipyard (because I realize my docking skills are too crap to do 20 launches and perfectly dock everything).

Current segment: Command and Habitation

Seen in this photo: The command and control module, agricultural pods, keribats and aeroponics, science module, and habitation ring.

Seen in this photo: Lander docking bays and observation:

Seen in this photo: Top docking bays for loading/unloading life support supplies, top docking bays for shuttles:

Things that will still be needed:

An ore processing hub (for making more fuel), a hub for launching and retrieving "scansats", liquid fuel tanks, nuclear propulsion engine cluster, a nuclear power hub (to cut down on part count re: solar panels), communications arrays, landers, mining ferry, shuttles.

Wow, that's huge!

What mods will it be using?

Wow, that's huge!

What mods will it be using?

This is only 1/3 to 1/4 of the ship. I don't think I'll be able to fit the entire thing into VAB. Mods are here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/42j3w9y7vi7o275/mods.ckan?dl=0

What't it for?

It's a kolony ship designed to stay permanently in space, exploring the system and resupplying from moons.

Beautiful ship.

Just make sure you can part weld it.

- - - Updated - - -

Things that I see missing. Sickness Avoidance System. Huge ship hard to turn.

Nice looking ship.

Power and perhaps communication seems to be an issue, 2.5 meter docking ports, I prefer to have them close to center as they are used for the heavy stuff.

One weak spot might be the centrifuge, to me it looks like the connection is a bit to thin, perhaps better to move up just after the bridge.

Orbital shipyard? perhaps adding the orbital shipyard modules on the mothership too?

Yeah, maneuverability will be an issue. When I put a power core/fuel/engines that COM and COT was all in the back. Maybe I could put maneuvering thrusters in the front? With the COM in the back I don't think the landers and small shuttles will be an issue.

I was thinking of a way I could return the ship to Kerbin, pick up MKS pods, and land them on, say, Duna. But I have no idea how to deliver MKS pods yet.

You stole my design before I even had a chance to think of it!

Seriously though, that thing is really awesome!

JR
This craft-sharing thread has been moved to the craft-sharing subforum.
nice, looks really cool. Have you considered an orbital shipyard aboard the ship which can build SCANSAT probes and science probes and land them for research.

How is this craft sharing when I haven't shared my craft file? Ah well.

Project ongoing, will update later tonight.
